```{r setup}
library(autorecipes)
library(magrittr)
```

# Usage

## Set of example recipes

```{r recipebook-example}

recipebook_example %>% head()

```

## Set your favourite recipes

```{r set-favourite}

recipebook <- set_favourites(recipebook_example, c(12, 11, 20, 14, 16, 7, 5))

```

## Create a meal plan

```{r create-meal-plan}

meal_plan <- create_meal_plan(
  recipebook, 
  days = c("Mon", "Tues", "Wed", "Thurs", "Fri", "Sat"),
  meals = "Dinner",
  fav_only = TRUE
)

meal_plan

```

## Create shopping list

```{r create-shopping-list}

shopping_list <- create_shopping_list(meal_plan)

shopping_list

readr::write_delim(shopping_list, "~/Downloads/shopping_list_dz.txt", delim = ",")

```
